extendedInfo.description: Meet Dealflicks â the #1 movie ticket deal app as mentioned by CNBC, NYTimes, CBS, NBC, TechCrunch, and more! Find movies, showtimes, tickets, deals, coupons, and discounts for your local movie theater.* Save up to 60% on movie tickets and concessions * No convenience fees * Some deals include popcorn and/or soda * Now available at 100+ locations and growing daily - Browse movies playing at participating theaters near you - Search for theaters by location - See user and critic ratings for each movie - See trailers for each movie - See movie info, cast, and description - Choose your showtime and your deal - Combine deals to create your own bundle - Simply show your confirmation page at the theater to redeem 88% of movie theater seats are currently empty. Dealflicks partners directly with theaters to offer you these unsold seats for a discount. Grab some popcorn and soda directly through the app to complete your movie experience. Also, unlike other movie ticketing apps, youâll never pay a convenience fee with us :) Please help us grow! Tell your favorite movie theater to join Dealflicks. This really helps us expand quicker so you can start enjoying all your movies with Dealflicks. Weâd love to hear your thoughts and feedback. Please email us at founders@dealflicks.com with your ideas, comments, suggestions, problems, and anything else youâd like to share. We read every email, and weâre constantly working to make the Dealflicks experience better.

reviews.title: amazing customer service
reviews.comment: if you have any issues or questions the team immediately replies to your emails! Great app!
reviews.author: Elisa Ciampa

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I love getting cheap movie tickets! Slick user interface, too.
reviews.author: Mike Denny

reviews.title: Great deals. Nice app
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe I can get movie tickets that cheap. Gonna go watch movies every weekend using Dealflicks. Don\'t need Netflix anymore.
reviews.author: Ngoc Trung Nguyen

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on t-mobile gs3, app never opens. Plus there is no way of signing in without having a Google + account.
reviews.author: trey clevenger
